item.title: [Resolved] General NFS outage
item.description: Update - We’ve had to restart our public SSH server as we try to resolve this issue. Traffic seems to be stabilizing, and we will continue to monitor the situation. (02:30 — Mar 22) Investigating - We’ve noticed slowness on our ssh server ssh.ocf.berkeley.edu, and slow response times for webhosting. We’re investigating. (00:20 — Mar 22)
item.content:
Update - We’ve had to restart our public SSH server as we try to resolve this issue. Traffic seems to be stabilizing, and we will continue to monitor the situation. (02:30 — Mar 22)

Investigating - We’ve noticed slowness on our ssh server ssh.ocf.berkeley.edu, and slow response times for webhosting. We’re investigating. (00:20 — Mar 22)

item.title: [Resolved] Mirrors transfer downtime
item.description: Resolved - After some configuration fixes, all mirrors are correctly syncing. (12:30 — Mar 11) Update - After more investigation, it seems some mirrors are out of date, and not syncing correctly. (10:25 — Mar 11) Resolved - After updating IP address entries on the new mirrors server, traffic seems to have stabilized. (02:36 — Mar 11) Investigating - After transferring our mirrors service to a new server, connections from certain networks outside Berkeley seem to be blocked.
item.content:
Resolved - After some configuration fixes, all mirrors are correctly syncing. (12:30 — Mar 11)

Update - After more investigation, it seems some mirrors are out of date, and not syncing correctly. (10:25 — Mar 11)

Resolved - After updating IP address entries on the new mirrors server, traffic seems to have stabilized. (02:36 — Mar 11)

Investigating - After transferring our mirrors service to a new server, connections from certain networks outside Berkeley seem to be blocked. (01:20 — Mar 11)

item.title: [Resolved] OCF website downtime
item.description: Update - This incident has been resolved. (15:18 — Feb 15) Update - The OCF website is now completely down as we attempt to redploy a fixed version. (15:14 — Feb 15) Investigating - We are seeing server errors for ocfweb access. (14:55 — Feb 15)
item.content:
Update - This incident has been resolved. (15:18 — Feb 15)

Update - The OCF website is now completely down as we attempt to redploy a fixed version. (15:14 — Feb 15)

Investigating - We are seeing server errors for ocfweb access. (14:55 — Feb 15)
